name: Magic Knight Out!!!
description:
Get ready to fight! In this Punch-Out!!! inspired fighting game, you will face off against a band of mad wizards who are both mentally and magically unstable. Jump over, duck under, and use your magic sword to block attacks, then counter attack to save the day! The more you block, the more power you gain, but absorb too much and you won’t live to tell of it!

How To Play:

  • W - Jump
  • A - Block
  • S - Duck
  • D - Attack
  • Space - Power Attack

Watch your opponent for a tell to know how to avoid a coming strike, then counterattack while they are open! Strike at just the right time to stun them and get a free power attack. Learn and exploit their pattern to master the fight and victory shall surely be yours. Please read the in-game tutorial for full details!

Minor update note: Fixed typo in credits and text scaling in tutorial for Web Build. Downloaded windows build has been left unmodified but will be updated after voting ends.
